prj_tplt_dh API¶

Simple documentation for my personal project.

Exploration¶

AverageResponse(data, response[, bins]) Compute and plot average response by variable

Preparation¶

FillData(data) Compute and plot average response by variable

Metric¶

gini(y_valid, y_pred) Calculate gini coefficient.
gini_norm(y_valid, y_pred) Calculate normalised gini coefficient.

Analysis¶

ModelMarginal(model, X, y[, bins]) Compute and plot marginal effects for model
